title: Drivers
description: All the endpoints related to the drivers.

endpoints.title: drivers
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a all the drivers in the database. The active and the old drivers.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: drivers/search
endpoints.description: Search with a q parameter for a driver or a list of drivers. Based on his name or surname.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

params.name: q
params.description: Search query, can be a driver name or surname.

endpoints.title: [driverId]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a driver in the database. Based on the provided driverId.

endpoints.title: [year]/drivers
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about all the drivers in the database. Based on the provided year.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: current/drivers
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about all the drivers in the database. Of the current season.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: [year]/drivers/[driverId]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a driver in the database. Based on the provided driverId and year.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: current/drivers/[driverId]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a driver and his race results. Based on the provided driverId and the current season.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: current/teams

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: [year]/teams/[teamId]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a team in the database. Based on the provided teamId and year.

endpoints.title: current/teams/[teamId]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a team in the database. Based on the provided teamId and the current season.

endpoints.title: [year]/teams/[teamId]/drivers
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about all the drivers in the database. Based on the provided teamId and year.

params.name: limit

params.name: offset

endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about all the drivers in the database. Based on the provided teamId and the current season.

title: Results
description: All the endpoints related to the race results.

endpoints.title: [year]/[round]/fp1
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves the results of the free practice 1 of the given round.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone to use for the dates. If not provided, the default timezone is used.

endpoints.title: current/last/fp1
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves the results of the latest free practice 1 of the current season.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone to use for the dates. If not provided, the default timezone is used.

title: Standings
description: All the endpoints related to the standings.

endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves drivers standings by the provided year.

endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves constructors standings by the provided year.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves drivers standings from the current season.

params.description: Number of records returned per request.

title: Circuits
description: All the endpoints related to the circuits.

endpoints.title: circuits
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about a all the circuits in the database. The active and the old circuits.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

endpoints.title: circuits/search
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about all the circuits in the database that match the search query. The query can be the circuit name, country or city.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

params.name: q
params.description: Search query, can be a circuit name, country or city.

endpoints.title: [circuitId]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about circuits in the database with the given Id.

title: Races
description: All the endpoints related to the races data.

endpoints.title: [year]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about the races of the given year.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone to use for the dates. If not provided, the default timezone is used.

endpoints.title: current
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about the races of the current seasons.

params.name: limit
params.description: Number of records returned per request.

params.name: offset
params.description: Number of records skipped before starting to fetch.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone to use for the dates. If not provided, the default timezone is used.

endpoints.title: [year]/[round]
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about the race of the given year and round.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone to use for the dates. If not provided, the default timezone is used.

endpoints.title: current/last
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about the last race of the current season.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone to use for the dates. If not provided, the default timezone is used.

endpoints.title: current/next
endpoints.description: This endpoint retrieves details about the next race of the current season.

params.name: timezone
params.description: Timezone to use for the dates. If not provided, the default timezone is used.
